mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHCROWD(SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ, DEL,ENDFLAG,REWARD) VALUES (SEQ_SHCROWD.nextval, #{title},#{content},#{id},#{goalMoney},0,0,#{tag}, #{sdate},#{edate},#{category},#{address},#{type},0,0,'0','0')
mapper.update: UPDATE SHCROWD SET DEL=1 WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ FROM SHCROWD WHERE REQ = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE SHCROWD SET REQ=1 WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT rnn,SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY SEQ DESC) rnn,SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ FROM SHCROWD WHERE REQ = 1) WHERE 12 >= rnn

SELECT rnn,SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC) rnn,SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ FROM SHCROWD WHERE REQ = 1) WHERE rnn between #{rnn}+1 AND #{rnn}+12

SELECT rnn,SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY SEQ DESC) rnn,SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ FROM SHCROWD WHERE REQ = 1
AND (TAG like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' OR TITLE like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' OR CONTENT like '%'|| #{search} ||'%')
AND (TAG like '%'|| #{search} || '%')
AND (TYPE like '%'|| #{search} || '%')
) WHERE 12 >= rnn

AND (TAG like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' OR TITLE like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' OR CONTENT like '%'|| #{search} ||'%')
AND (TAG like '%'|| #{search} || '%')
AND (TYPE like '%'|| #{search} || '%')
) WHERE rnn between #{rnn}+1 AND #{rnn}+12
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHFUND(SEQ, PSEQ, MONEY, SDATE, ID) VALUES (SEQ_SHFUND.nextval,#{pseq},#{money},sysdate,#{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE SHCROWD SET CURMONEY = CURMONEY + #{money} WHERE SEQ=#{pseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHCROWDLIKE(SEQ, PSEQ, ID) VALUES (SEQ_SHCROWDLIKE.nextval,#{pseq},#{id})
mapper.delete: DELETE SHCROWDLIKE WHERE id=#{id} and pseq=#{pseq}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM SHCROWDLIKE WHERE id=#{id} and pseq=#{pseq}
